example.text: This outage caused the first nationwide ground stop of aircrafts since the September 11, 2001 attacks. The FAA's failure to improve legacy systems is unacceptable, and the American people deserve and expect better .
The grant was obtained through a bipartisan push by myself and my Democratic colleague Eddie Bernice Johnson, who retired this month. Read more about DPD's grant here .

The Republican border plan is a good first step to force the DHS to enforce our laws, empower ICE to deport people back to their home countries, and help fund local law enforcement to better deal with criminal aliens and cartel gangs around the country. WATCH my remarks here. [[url]]
It's time to hold the Biden Administration accountable for the crisis at our southern border. The new House Republican majority will not rest while Biden's era of narco slavery flourishes in America.

During our [[user]] Committee field hearing in Staten Island, I was able to ask our witness about our dependence on China for importing Critical Minerals. They stated we have an untapped market which we must unleash. Watch my full questioning here! [[url]]

Are you a Chinese company looking to cheat American workers? You’re in luck! [[user]] handed you another gift: his veto of HJRes.39, our bipartisan bill to stop the Admin. from giving Chinese solar producers a free pass to circumvent tariffs. Today, I voted to OVERRIDE his veto.

After 2 1/2 years of neglect by Democrats, House Republicans have taken an important step to secure our borders. I was pleased to support this legislation to restart border wall construction, address the fentanyl crisis, and give needed resources to our border patrol agents.
